name: Kawa-Kawa Hill
description: A scenic eco-tourism park in Ligao City known for its bamboo groves and panoramic hilltop views.

name: Mount Masaraga (Campsite)
description: A hiking and camping site in Ligao City popular among trekkers and nature lovers.

name: Tigbao Highlands
description: A highland spot in Ligao City offering fresh air and panoramic views of the city and nearby mountains.

name: Batong Languyon
description: A natural swimming site in Ligao City known for its clear waters and unique rock formations.

name: Ligao City Heritage Library & Museum
description: A cultural museum in the old municipal building showcasing Ligao’s history and heritage.
address: In front of the park, Ligao City (old municipal building)

name: Bloom's beach Resort
description: A beachside resort in Ligao City providing leisure and family activities.

name: Bernese Resort Hotel
description: A modern resort hotel in Ligao City offering lodging, dining, and recreation.

name: Ligao Bed and Breakfast
description: A cozy bed and breakfast in Ligao City providing homely accommodations.

name: Kuyang’s Bar and Restaurant
description: A casual bar and restaurant in Ligao City serving local dishes and drinks.

name: La Terraza Restaurant
description: A family-style restaurant in Ligao City offering Filipino cuisine.

name: Primo’s Restaurant
description: A popular restaurant in Ligao City serving Bicolano and Filipino dishes.

name: Berman’s Ice Cream Hauz
description: A dessert shop in Guilid, Ligao City, famous for its ice cream and halo-halo.
